title: Action-reaction
brief_description: A study of the changing approach to the teaching of physical education in Victorian secondary schools. Shows how the highly competitive and restrictive activities of cricket and football have been augmented by a wide range of both popular and unusual sports which allow the student to develop within his own capacity.
